CustomField.description: This is synced with the CMS. If payments are not being processed through Givergy's Stripe account and will paid to the client post-event (manual reconciliation), this box will be unticked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is synced with the CMS. If payments are not being processed through Givergy's Stripe account and will paid to the client post-event (manual reconciliation), this box will be unticked.
CustomField.label: Manual Reconciliation
